traits.Amphibious: The koalinth can breathe air and water.
traits.Martial Advantage: Once per turn, the sergeant can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the sergeant that isn't incapacitated.

actions.Multiattack: The sergeant makes two melee attacks with its trident.
actions.Trident: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.Hooked Net: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, range 10/30 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target is restrained. A creature can use its action to make a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Strength check to free itself or another creature in a hooked net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.
